long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience chromium with live wallpapers that put you in the center of the battlefield.

The "Call of Duty Live Wallpapers" Chrome extension transforms each new tab into a high-action scene inspired by one of the worldâ€™s most iconic gaming franchises. From gritty landscapes to intense combat scenarios, these live wallpapers capture the essence of Call of Duty, making every browser session feel like a mission. The minimalist design provides a clean and functional layout while keeping you immersed in the Call of Duty universe.

Features include:

Live Wallpapers: Epic Call of Duty scenes with dynamic visuals.
Quick Website Shortcuts: Access top sites without missing a beat.
Google Search Bar: Seamlessly search from your action-packed tab.
Perfect for Call of Duty fans who crave excitement, this extension balances high-impact visuals with a practical layout. Embrace the thrill of the battlefield every time you open a new tab, turning each click into a part of the mission.
